cause.description:
To purchase land and a basic building structure that would serve as a community center to meet the needs of children and young adults victimized by war, torture and abuse.
We are seeking clothing, sports equipment as well as financial donations for the children of Northern Uganda.
1. www.giftsforgulu.com
2. www.charlotteeagles.com
cause.mission: To assist traumatized children living in the war zones of Northern Uganda by building a community center that will provide for the urgent needs of these youth.
cause.name: Gifts For Gulu
